mapper.sql: id, path, detail, entity_id, type, request_method, param_id, result_id
mapper.insert: insert into interface(path, detail, entity_id, type, request_method, param_id, result_id) values(#{path},#{detail},#{entityId},#{type},#{requestMethod},#{paramId},#{resultId})
